thread.section_title: Grantly Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great value
thread.title_full: Great value - Review of Grantly Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Stephen L
title: Great value
text:
I was pleasantly surprised by the Grantly Hotel, less than 20 min walk to the event I was attending at Olympia at a much more competitive rate than those closer to the venue.
The staff were friendly and helpful upon arrival with my room available earlier than I had requested.
A decent sized room for London, a comfortable bed, good wifi and a surprisingly quiet room given how close it is to busy roads.
Great value, I'll certainly be looking to book here again if I'm working in the vicinity.
